Detailed Description

The default cleaner uses a simple 2 threshold process.

Definition at line 33 of file ImageCleaner.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DefaultImageCleaner::DefaultImageCleaner ( Camera &  camera,
vector< Pedestal > &  peds,
double  picture,
double  boundary 
)

The default image cleaner uses picture and boundary theshold values (expressed in standard deviations from the pedestal) to determine the accepted pixels.

All tubes above the picture threshold are accepted. Tubes above the boundary threshold with at least one neighboring "picture" tube are also accepted.

Parameters:
camerareference to the camera object to use for pixel positions and neighborlist.
pedsreference to the Pedestal array for the current run.
picturethe picture threshold in std deviations.
boundarythe boundary threhold in std deviations.
